__e: You're right, I've been gone a long time, Megan, but it's what's outside of Wayward Pines - that should concern you!
Which is why it took her school to discover what happened after the girl was absent for a number of days.
You have been an absentee father and husband for years and I know you don't mean it, but I don't want that anymore.
Are you really that thirsty or do just want me to leave the room?
"She's only 12, and she's been missing from her home for many months."
- No, just... since my accident, I go away for a few moments from time to time.
My dad was away a lot, and I'm not gonna do that to you.
But the thing is, when I was your age, he was in the Air Force and he was gone a lot, and he didn't have time to teach me much, so...
The life where the husband's always gone and work always comes first...
